So, to clear the OP/ED thing. I'm amazed at people's stupidity. If you have a good video player (media player classic) it automatically plays op/ed every ep. (it's as if they were in the file, but saves like 700mb space)

Good rip, but they cut all the OP/ED credits off and put them in separate files.  I know some people like it that way, but I personally don't and everyone should know that they do this before deciding to grab this collection.
The fact that they cut the op/ed off into separate files is useful for people not wanting to see them in every single episode, f.x. marathon. Thora is closest to perfect.
They cut off the OP/ED on all the episodes and the font isn't that great.
The subs they chose contain nonsensical lines that at times seem simply made up. You might as well watch it raw and make up your own dialogue.
The OP/ED are in a separate file because of ordered chapters.  It saves space.  Update your playback settings, and don't vote down a good group because of your own stupidity.
